title: League of legends client will not install
body:
About an hour ago i uninstalled league of legends from my device expecting to reinstall without a problem. I start the installation and when that's done it opens the client where i am greeted with a notification asking me if i would like to upgrade to which i have said yes to. The BETA client does not start i click launch on the main client and i get a notification saying "League of Legends has encountered a problem. Please re-install League alpha client to try again".
i went into the program files to see if i could launch league client application in the hopes that the BETA client would start but i was shown the same message as above.

Please help me i don't know what to do at this point.

replies.body:
Hey there,

Did you download the latest installer package from [here](https://signup.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/signup/redownload)?

Could you try reinstalling league once again, let me know if this helps.
